net.kuujo.vertigo.io.connection

Interface ConnectionContext<T extends ConnectionContext<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context<T>, JsonSerializable, Observable<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputConnectionContext, OutputConnectionContext

    public interface ConnectionContext<T extends ConnectionContext<T>>
extends Context<T>
    Connection contexts represent a direct connection between two instances of separate components.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
